children.content: Only be strong and very courageous; be careful to do according  to all the
which Moses My servant commanded you; do not turn  from it to the right or to the left, so that you may achieve  success wherever you go.

shall not  depart from your mouth, but you shall meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do according to all that is written in it; for then you will make your way prosperous, and then you will achieve success.
